entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
